item.title: New Container: Webgrabplus
item.description: We have released a new container for Webgrabplus! Webgrabplus is a multi-site incremental xmltv epg grabber. It collects tv-program guide data from selected tvguide sites for your favourite channels.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Webgrabplus!

Webgrabplus is a multi-site incremental xmltv epg grabber. It collects tv-program guide data from selected tvguide sites for your favourite channels.
